meaningMnemonic: If you put a <radical>roof</radical> over a <radical>valley</radical> it will change its <kanji>form</kanji>. Its <kanji>appearance</kanji> will alter completely!
readingMnemonic: Its new <kanji>appearance</kanji> looks familiar to you, like it's a big <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう) cup! A valley with a roof on it looks exactly like a yogurt cup. Huh!
